channel.title: Rune crossbow and chaotic crossbow aren't workin
channel.description:
so my rune crossbow& chaotic crossbow aren't working...... it keeps saying "you cant use ruby bolt (or any type) with chaotic crossbow"
and with rune crossbow " you must use bolts with a crossbow".....
help plz
Edit: i was able to fix rune crossbow but i still have problem with my chaotic.....

item.title: Rune crossbow and chaotic crossbow aren't workin
item.dc:creator: @pkcrown pkcrown
item.description:
@pkcrown wrote:

boolean usingCross = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 9185 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 18357;

lol it seems like if i fix one the other one wont work

Read full topic
item.source: Rune crossbow and chaotic crossbow aren't workin

item.title: Rune crossbow and chaotic crossbow aren't workin

item.description:

boolean usingCross

in CombatAssistant and paste that here
